name: SpaceX
description:
This is a school project, nothing significant.

A basic shoot-em-up with basic controls in a basic background.

NOTE: Not certain if the SFX volume problem is fixed. Play with caution.
NOTE 2: I'm aware of the choppy beginning of the boss track... Can't fix it.

I'm planning on making SpaceXtended sometime, being a "sequel/expansion" to this game. Look forward to future updates.

Music generated using Photo Story 3.
SFX made in http://www.bfxr.net/

The game's also on Game Jolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/spacex/230335
